name: simunus
description: SimuNUS is an interactive Unity + Electron-based simulation app designed to help NUS freshmen — especially international students — navigate administrative processes, campus wayfinding, and digital platforms via a fun, RPG-style interface

scripts.package: npm --prefix simulated_desktop run build && electron-forge package
scripts.make: npm --prefix simulated_desktop run build && electron-forge make
scripts.publish: npm --prefix simulated_desktop run build && electron-forge publish

author: lenovo
